project_descr: To minimize impacts on health and the global environment though sound chemicals management and reduction of POPs releases and exposure to POPs from e-waste and pesticides management operations in Mexico.

outputs.output_title: PPG Sound Management of POPs C
outputs.output_descr: Develop a project document (PRODOC) for the sound Management of POPs Containing Waste in Mexico (GEF PPG Phase)
